author: juergen
msg: We can not restore all properties from the associated VR, so reanimated the code which creates a backup in checkout() and restores from this backup in uncheckout().

author: juergen
msg: Set response status before throwing an exception in method parseRequest().
Use appropriate status code for each exception.

author: juergen
msg: Use updateVCR() to restore the VCR in method uncheckout().
Removed no longer needed methods to backup/restore the properties.

author: juergen
msg: Update <checked-out> set of associated VR in case a checked-out VCR has been moved.

author: juergen
msg: Update <checked-out> set of associated VR in case a checked-out VCR has been deleted.
